mapper.select: SELECT a.scs_start_date, a.scs_end_date, a.movie_num, a.theater_num, b.screen_cinema_num, b.screen_seat_row, b.screen_seat_col,b.screen_dimension, a.scs_empty_seat FROM screen_session as a JOIN screen_info as b ON a.screen_num = b.screen_num WHERE a.movie_num = #{movie_num} AND a.theater_num = #{theater_num} AND DATE(a.scs_start_date) = STR_TO_DATE(#{select_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
